meta_description: The San Mateo County Historical Association is dedicated to inspiring wonder and discovery through education about the cultural and natural history of San Mateo County.

# Locations, Hours & Admissions

## San Mateo County History Museum

The [History Museum](/web/20251221000625/https://historysmc.org/san-mateo-county-history-museum/) is an innovative regional history center. Featuring interactive experiences, the long-term exhibits are the place where you can explore the county’s rich and colorful history.

**Hours  
**Tuesday – Sunday  
10 a.m. – 4 p.m.

Last admission at 3:45 p.m.

Closed on December 24, December 25 and January 1.

Accessible lift available.

2200 Broadway  
Redwood City, CA 94063 | [Get directions](/web/20251221000625/https://historysmc.org/maps-directions/)  
650.299.0104 | [Email](http://web.archive.org/web/20251221000625/mailto:info@historysmc.org)

#### Museum Admission

**[Members](/web/20251221000625/https://historysmc.org/support-us/#membership):** Free

**Adults:** $6

**Seniors & Students:** $4

**Children:** Free  
5 and under

The History Museum participates in these [free and reduced admissions programs](/web/20251221000625/https://historysmc.org/discounts/).

## Archives

Research the county’s past in the [Archives](/web/20251221000625/https://historysmc.org/smcha-archives/) through the books, photographs, maps, newspapers and records.

**Hours  
****The Archives are open to researchers by appointment only. Appointments are available Tuesdays, Fridays and Sunda...
